text: Hedley Vicars Dickson (March 3, 1858 – April 24, 1942) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Kings County from 1912 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1858 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Hedley V. Dickson
